findings.title: Anyone is able to mint NFTs by calling mintNFTsForLM
findings.description: The contract does not have any kind of special permissions to limit who is able to mint tokens. An attacker could call LiquidityMiningNFT.mintNFTsForLM(0xhackerAddress) to mint tokens for their address and sell them on the marketplace.

findings.title: Save some gas when looping over state arrays
findings.description: Consider caching the length in a local variable to reduce gas costs.

findings.title: Profit and loss distribution mechanism is not working
findings.description: The profit and loss distribution mechanism is not functioning correctly, resulting in issues with premium distribution to liquidity providers.
